typeDescription.name: Annotation.General.BaseAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base Annotation type system extends the base class annotation and defines two features namely Source (string) and Confidence ( integer) which will be inherited by the other annotations for book keeping purpose explaining where the annotation was created and how good the annotation is.

featureDescription.name: Source
featureDescription.description: Source displays the location where an annotation was originally created by

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: This feature is used to display the Confidence level of an annotation

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Input.Question
typeDescription.description: The input is nothing but several lines comprising of Questions and Answers. Question type system is used to annotate the Questions among the input.

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Input.Answer
typeDescription.description: Answer annotation is used to annotate the Answer lines given in the input. This has a feature by name IsCorrect which is set to 1 if the answer is correct and to 0 if the answer is wrong

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: IsCorrect determines if the answer line answers the given question or not by true or false

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Pipeline.Token
typeDescription.description: Splits the sentence based with whitespace/punctuation as delimiter

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Pipeline.NGramAnnotator
typeDescription.description: This is to annotate the uni/bi/tri gram consecutive tokens

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Pipeline.AnswerScoring
typeDescription.description: This annotates the answers with the answer score

typeDescription.name: Annotation.Pipeline.Evaluator
typeDescription.description: This sorts the answers based on the scores and calculates the precision using a defined formula

typeDescription.name: Object.Type.Entity
typeDescription.description: Describes the EntityName like Person/Organization/Company/Location etc.

typeDescription.name: Object.Type.Relation
typeDescription.description: Describes the predicate portion of the sentence.
